channel.title: Certius || Development || Hyperion
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/7352/banner2ga.png[/img]
[url=http://certius.tk/][img]http://runecient.com/favicon.ico[/img]Official Website[/url] [img]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img]
[b][size=18pt]Introduction[/size][/b] Welcome to Certius's Development thread. The base is Hyperion. We moved into Hyperion for more fun and for educative purposes. We will keep this development slowly. We are not doing any remake. This will be an economy based server.
[b][size=18pt]Team[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Imsuperman05[/li] [li]Iz3 Legend[/li] [li]Ertas[/li] [li]Skyru[/li][/ul]
[b][size=18pt]Update Log[/size][/b] [code] MM/DD/YY : Description
_________________________________________________________________ 02/27/12 Name: Project Started
02/27/12 Imsuperman05: Wrote trade system. 02/27/12 Imsuperman05: Fixed up combat to the basics at least. 02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Wrote prayer handling/draining, just need icons to show properly client-sided. 02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Still working on npc combat. 02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Fixed up action skills to work properly. 02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Pickpocketing for thieving works 100% atm, just needs more data. 02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Added some shops, and fixed up the shop manager (had some bugs). 02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Started on basic slayer, assigning tasks. 02/29/12 Imsuperman05: Started private messaging. 02/29/12 Imsuperman05: Added about 80% npc spawns deserializing through xml. 03/29/12 Imsuperman05: Fixed some packet handlers. 03/29/12 Imsuperman05: Added dialogues closeable, just need to get the methods. 03/01/12 Imsuperman05: Started on basic runecrafting. 03/01/12 Imsuperman05: Added some more dialogue methods. 03/01/12 Imsuperman05: Found an full npc list.xml, so i'm currently using that. 03/01/12 Skyru: Improved the contains() method in EntityList, now it doesn't cycle through the entities in order to find the one it's looking for. 03/01/12 Ertas: Started Client Renaming [/code]
[b][size=18pt]Media[/size][/b]
[b]None yet. Blank Hyperion :o[/b]

item.title: Certius || Development || Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

imsuperman05:

stuff

I bet I know what the mistake is. :rolleyes: I did it myself when I tried adding hit update mask haha. Check your order of masks in player updating/npc updating. Bet you didn’t add in correct order.

Read full topic

item.title: Certius || Development || Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Ertas, post:1, topic:434794”]

Official Website

[size=18pt]Introduction[/size]
Welcome to Certius’s Development thread. The base is Hyperion. We moved into Hyperion for more fun and for educative purposes. We will keep this development slowly. We are not doing any remake. This will be an economy based server.

[size=18pt]Team[/size]

[ul][li]Imsuperman05[/li]
[li]Ertas[/li]
[li]Skyru[/li][/ul]

[size=18pt]Update Log[/size]

MM/DD/YY : Description

_________________________________________________________________
02/27/12 Name: Project Started

02/27/12 Imsuperman05: Wrote trade system.
02/27/12 Imsuperman05: Fixed up combat to the basics at least.
02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Wrote prayer handling/draining, just need icons to show properly client-sided.
02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Still working on npc combat.
02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Fixed up action skills to work properly.
02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Pickpocketing for thieving works 100% atm, just needs more data.
02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Added some shops, and fixed up the shop manager (had some bugs).
02/28/12 Imsuperman05: Started on basic slayer, assigning tasks.
02/29/12 Imsuperman05: Started private messaging.
02/29/12 Imsuperman05: Added about 80% npc spawns deserializing through xml.
03/29/12 Imsuperman05: Fixed some packet handlers.
03/29/12 Imsuperman05: Added dialogues closeable, just need to get the methods.
03/01/12 Imsuperman05: Started on basic runecrafting.
03/01/12 Imsuperman05: Added some more dialogue methods.
03/01/12 Imsuperman05: Found an full npc list.xml, so i'm currently using that.
03/01/12 Skyru: Improved the contains() method in EntityList, now it doesn't cycle through the entities in order to find the one it's looking for.
03/01/12 Ertas: Started Client Renaming
03/02/12 Imsuperman05: Worked on combat some more, now 1on1 lasts non-stop, haven't started multi yet.
03/02/12 Imsuperman05: Started npc drops, but ran into 1 problem, which i'm unsure of what the hell is even going on.
03/02/12 Imsuperman05: Fixed some bugs with some skills.
03/02/12 Imsuperman05: Finished npc dieing/respawning, still need to figure out how the hell to send the hits to the client to display the hitmarks.
03/03/12 Imsuperman05: Worked on magic a bit, magic V npc works, so does player, just needs to support more spells.  Going to start on magic like enchant soon.
03/03/12 Imsuperman05: Also finished on ip logging, and ban logging with a simple map, and reader/writer.

[size=18pt]Media[/size]

None yet. Blank Hyperion :o[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Certius || Development || Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:20, topic:434794”]Finished npc dieing/respawning, still need to figure out how the hell to send the hits to the client to display the hitmarks.

Update mask.[/quote]
Yeah, I’ve tried it multiple times, even had t4 help, but the client wouldn’t read it. Later i’ll send you the error and the data types i’m trying to send.

[quote=“Skyru, post:21, topic:434794”]Update:
Started cooking.[/quote]
We already have cooking, just need to fill up the enum.

Read full topic

item.title: Certius || Development || Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Skyru, post:18, topic:434794”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=537510.msg3932759#msg3932759 date=1330820111]
Hope you guys stick with it.
[/quote]
As of lately, Rod has been doing all the work.
I have to ‘step up my game’[/quote]

Don’t worry Wanderer, I will never stop this. I’m highly motivated because I love this source.

Some more updates:
Worked on combat some more, now 1on1 lasts non-stop, haven’t started multi yet.
Started npc drops, but ran into 1 problem, which i’m unsure of what the hell is even going on.
Fixed some bugs with some skills.
Finished npc dieing/respawning, still need to figure out how the hell to send the hits to the client to display the hitmarks.
Worked on magic a bit, magic V npc works, so does player, just needs to support more spells. Going to start on magic like enchant soon.
Also finished on ip logging, and ban logging with a simple map, and reader/writer.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Skyru Skyru

Hope you guys stick with it.

As of lately, Rod has been doing all the work.
I have to ‘step up my game’
